name: games-of-life
description: is a Mathematical solution to any Game of Life variation

scripts.build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run jekyll; git status
scripts.push: git push origin master && npm run gh-pages_push
scripts.pull: git pull origin master && npm run gh-pages_pull
scripts.browserify: for x in demo dist test; do npm run browserify_$x; done
scripts.browserify_demo: NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=src browserify demo/index.js -t babelify -o gh-pages/js/demo.js
scripts.gh-pages_push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages_pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > gh-pages/index.md; cat README.md >> gh-pages/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run cp; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint_src; npm run lint_test
scripts.lint_test: cd test; standard --global describe --global it; cd -
scripts.postupdate-deps: npm test && git commit -am 'updated deps' || git checkout -- package.json
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run _push
